services: Nationwide + localized expertise across South FL counties

content.about: 1\. Prestige Estate Services provides professional antique appraisal services specializing in Fine art. With Since ~2012[[9]] experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the Palm Beach area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Elizabeth W.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. Their expertise with my antique pocket watch collection was impressive.

reviews.author: Emily W.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.author: Jessica W.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.author: Jessica T.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

reviews.author: Linda C.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of antique furniture values was exceptional. The documentation they provided was detailed and perfect for my insurance needs.

content.about: Palm Beach Antique Appraisals provides professional antique appraisal services in the Palm Beach area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.
